message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to make a fair offer. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $170. What do you think?
I like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $145. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $155. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $150 for it. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
I understand you're trying to save a bit more, Bob. I'm willing to compromise again. I'll sell the product to you for $152.50. That's my best offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still looking to stick to my original target price of $150. Is there any way we can meet at that price?
I understand you're really close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $151. That's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still looking to stick to my original target price of $150. I'm not willing to pay more than that. Is there any way we can meet at that price?
